00021 class Rect {
00022     public:
00025         Rect();
00026 
00028         Rect(XYDIM left, XYDIM top, XYDIM right, XYDIM bottom);
00029 
00031         Rect(const Point& pos, const Size& size);
00032         
00033         // needed because of a bug in the tasking-compiler
00034         Rect(const Rect& rect) { *this = rect; }
00035 
00037         void SetLeft(XYDIM left) { m_left = left; }
00038 
00040         XYDIM GetLeft() const { return m_left; }
00041 
00043         void SetTop(XYDIM top) { m_top = top; }
00044 
00046         XYDIM GetTop() const { return m_top; }
00047 
00049         void SetRight(XYDIM right)  { m_right = right; }
00050 
00052         XYDIM GetRight() const  { return m_right;}
00053 
00055         void SetBottom(XYDIM bottom) { m_bottom = bottom; }
00056 
00058         XYDIM GetBottom() const { return m_bottom; }
00059 
00061         void SetWidth(XYDIM width) { m_right = m_left + width - 1; }
00062 
00064         XYDIM GetWidth() const { return m_right - m_left + 1; }
00065 
00067         void SetHeight(XYDIM height) { m_bottom = m_top + height - 1; }
00068 
00070         XYDIM GetHeight() const { return m_bottom - m_top + 1; }
00071 
00073         void SetSize(const Size& size);
00074 
00076         void SetSize(XYDIM width, XYDIM height);
00077 
00079         Size GetSize() const { return Size(GetWidth(), GetHeight()); }
00080 
00082         void Move(XYDIM dx, XYDIM dy);
00083 
00085         void SetEmpty();
00086 
00090         BOOLEAN IsEmpty() const { return (m_right < m_left || m_bottom < m_top); }
00091 
00093         const Rect& Intersect(const Rect& rect);
00094 
00096         const Rect& Union(const Rect& rect);
00097 
00099         BOOLEAN IsInside(const Rect& rect) const;
00100 
00102         void Set(XYDIM left, XYDIM top, XYDIM right, XYDIM bottom);
00103 
00105         void Expand(XYDIM left, XYDIM top = 0, XYDIM right = 0, XYDIM bottom = 0);
00106 
00108         BOOLEAN operator==(const Rect& rect) const;
00109 
00111         BOOLEAN operator!=(const Rect& rect) const;
00112 
00114         void SetPos(const Point& pos);
00115 
00117         void SetPos(XYDIM x, XYDIM y);
00118 
00120         Point GetPos() const;
00121 
00123         void SetXPos(XYDIM x);
00124 
00126         XYDIM GetXPos() const;
00127         
00129         void SetYPos(XYDIM y);
00130 
00132         XYDIM GetYPos() const;
00133 
00134     protected:
